issue.title: [C++] Remove SyncScanner
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12414](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12414). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Someday, assuming AsyncScanner does great and is established and stable, we should remove SyncScanner.  There is a fair amount of legacy code that is sticking around solely to support the SyncScanner and I am using this issue to tag that code for future removal.
